        public abstract int[] takeTurn()

      • tripleNumber

        public double tripleNumber()
                    throws GameErrorException
        This method, only used when a player has three of the same number, calculates the sum.
        Returns:
        the score provided by the triple numbers
        Throws:
        GameErrorException - - if the preconditions aren't met (there must be three of a number and not one of the three of a number can be an ace). If even one card's number is an ace, all three will for the first condition (3 identical numbers) to be met.
